thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au
thread.title: Chau

author: Chau
title: Chau
text: The staff at Motorama Morooka Kia were extremely kind and patient when me and my family were there as we were looking to get a new car. They listened to what we wanted and answered the questions that we had. Steve Young was one of the staff that helped us for the majority and we are so grateful because he was kind, friendly, understood us well and was extremely patient. Would definitely recommend his services as well as the services at Motorama!
